Subject: Urgent legal support required: Mimecast MSA in word format
Importance: High

 

Good Morning @Dana Mahdi <mailto:Dana.Mahdi@chalhoub.com>  and @Faraz Hasan <mailto:Faraz.hasan@chalhoub.com> 

I hope this message finds you well. 

 

We have an urgent need for a comprehensive review of a MSA for Mimecast. Given the critical timelines associated with this engagement, it is essential to ensure all terms are aligned with our Group’s legal and compliance standards.

 

Could you please prioritize this review and share any feedback or necessary revisions at the earliest? 

 

If there are specific clauses that require particular focus, or if you foresee any potential challenges, let us know so we can address them proactively.

 

Please let me know if any additional background information or context would be helpful.

Please let me know if any additional background information or context would be helpful. I appreciate your swift attention to this matter as we are required to have this agreed by 22nd November and Mimecast has requested your feedback no later than 8th November.

 

Kind Regards

 

Dee

 

DEE DEU​​​​

DIRECTOR ‑ INFORMATION SECURITY

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI
